# GroundingShadowComponent.FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects.fade

**Case**

A grounding shadow behavior that fades when an entity is near physical objects.

## Declaration

```swift
case fade
```

## Discussion

On iOS devices without LiDAR, the option is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GroundingShadowComponent/FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects-swift.enum/constant].
title: GroundingShadowComponent.FadeBehaviorNearPhysicalObjects.fade
